definitions.definition: Covered with, or containing unclean matter; dirty.
definitions.example: A ship's bottom is foul when overgrown with barnacles

definitions.definition: (of words or a way of speaking) obscene, vulgar or abusive.
definitions.example: His foul language causes many people to believe he is uneducated.

definitions.definition: Detestable, unpleasant, loathsome.
definitions.example: He has a foul set of friends.

definitions.definition: Disgusting, repulsive; causing disgust.
definitions.example: There was a foul smell coming from the toilet.

definitions.definition: Ugly; homely; poor.
(of the weather) Unpleasant, stormy or rainy.
Dishonest or not conforming to the established rules and customs of a game, conflict, test, etc.
Entangled and therefore restricting free movement, not clear.
Outside of the base lines; in foul territory.
definitions.example: Jones hit foul ball after foul ball.

definitions.definition: A breach of the rules of a game, especially one involving inappropriate contact with an opposing player in order to gain an advantage; for example, tripping someone up in soccer, or contact of any kind in basketball.
A (usually accidental) contact between a bowler and the lane before the bowler has released the ball.
A foul ball, a ball which has been hit outside of the base lines.
definitions.example: Jones hit a foul up over the screen.

definitions.definition: To make dirty.
To besmirch.
To clog or obstruct.
definitions.example: The hair has fouled the drain.

definitions.definition: To entangle.
definitions.example: The kelp has fouled the prop.

definitions.definition: To make contact with an opposing player in order to gain advantage.
To hit outside of the baselines.
definitions.example: Jones fouled the ball off the facing of the upper deck.

definitions.definition: To become clogged.
To become entangled.
definitions.example: The prop fouled on the kelp.

definitions.definition: To commit a foul.
definitions.example: Smith fouled within the first minute of the quarter.

definitions.definition: To hit a ball outside of the baselines.
